document_data.name: ''Figurehead of Wondrous Power''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''figurehead of wondrous power''''' was a [[magic]]al wood statue that granted beneficial powers to a [[spelljamming ship]].{{Cite dragon/159/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Magic from the stars}}
document_data.Description: Each type of figurehead was carved in the shape of a creature, typically [[humanoid]], using a particular type of wood. Each figure was inlaid with one or multiple [[jewels]], depending on the boon it provided.
document_data.Varieties:
Each type of figurehead provided different boons, and were constructed from different materials.
* ''[[Figurehead of attacks]]'': Summoned a warrior that could be controlled in combat by the spelljamming [[mage]].
* ''[[Figurehead of disguise]]'': Projected illusions on the spelljammer, altering its appearance to onlookers.
* ''[[Figurehead of speed]]'': Increased the tactical speed of a spelljamming ship, though not during travel.
